page.title: 01RUNCORN THE LOCAL AREA
page.content: Most of the area of Runcorn we have been looking at has been built within the past 25 years.It spreads eastwards from the Old Town and the industrial plant that border the River Mersey.To the south of the area are housing estates,some a similar age to those in our study,many much younger. We have looked at the following aspects within our 12 square km block: Local history,with particular reference to Norton Priory; Farming and the effects upon it of Runcon's development as a New Town;Trade and Transport,looking especially at the Shopping City and the Busway;the Ecology of the locality and also Housing. Finally we include a personal account of life in Runcorn as seen by an eight year old child.
